Name: CouchQuiz!
About the game: On CouchQuiz! You will be able to show your viewers who think they are smarter than anyone, who is the smartest. Compete against your viewers on stream as you compete to climb the in-game rankings and become the world's smartest streamer, or maybe one of your viewers will be the world's smartest. Who knows? Features: More than 1500 questions of interest for the modern public. 4 categories of questions (general culture, sports, history, science). Different game modes, not just questions. Custom questions depending on the language of the game.
Meta Title: CouchQuiz!: Mar 1, 2023, RaidrDev and Full Overview
